effect.en: As long as Wailord remains Asleep between turns, remove 1 damage counter from Wailord.
effect.fr: Tant que Wailord est Endormi entre deux tours, retirez-lui 1 marqueur de dégât.

effect.en: If Wailord has any damage counters on it, Wailord is now Asleep.
effect.fr: Si Wailord possède des marqueurs de dégât, il est maintenant Endormi.
